job.title: Senior Software Test Engineer
job.description: at dish the testing and quality assurance tqa teams mission is to deliver software that meets business needs and allows for a positive customer experience the senior software test engineer as part of the software development family is a leader in the development of automated test solutions to support the overall software delivery team in a fastpaced it environment they ensure software meets business requirements coach and drive the team to design execute and test scenarios that exercise all required test conditions to ensure all deadlines are metltbrgtltulgtltligt perform oracle e business suite functional testing ltligtltligt develop and build an automation framework for oracle e business suite ltligtltligt coordinate and manage a single application project from a test perspective including assigned resources and testing progress ltligtltligt develop and review the test plans and test coverage including scope definition resource identification risks and schedule ltligtltligt lead requirements and test designcase reviews perform test case reviews with other team members ltligtltligt represent the test team in project status meeting and communicate issues appropriately ltligtltligt review test scripts automation and manual for coding best practice and ease of maintainability perspective ltligtltligt compile and analyze metrics on testing activities and generate testing status reports during the testing phase ltligtltligt design create and maintain manual and automation test scripts ltligtltligt run tests during the execution test phase and report issues identified ltligtltligt create and distribute dailyweekly status reports to management ltligtltligt other duties as required ltligtltligt babs or mams preferred plus years of progressively related experience ltligtltligt advanced knowledge of oracle e business suite version ltligtltligt advanced knowledge of the following modules financials order management time and labor ltligtltligt strong knowledge of edi document type and interfaces ltligtltligt applied knowledge of sql or other database query tools ltligtltligt applied knowledge of designing building and maintaining automation frameworks ltligtltligt advanced knowledge of software testing techniques methodologies policies and procedures ltligtltligt advanced knowledge of test management and automation toolsets ltligtltligt high level of curiosity and strong desire to succeed ltligtltligt strong verbal written communication and presentation skills all levels ie leadership customers vendors and business partners ltligtltligt able to represent the overall testing organization in a positive and intelligent manner ltligtltligt ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists ltligtltulgt compensation yr yrltbrgtltbrgtfrom versatile health perks to new career opportunities check out our benefits on our careers website ltbrgtltbrgtemployment is contingent on successful completion of a preemployment screen which may include a drug test
